thread.title: Apple Music now has 15 million users worldwide
thread.title_full: Apple Music now has 15 million users worldwide

title: Apple Music now has 15 million users worldwide
text:
Apple Music now has 15 million users worldwide 
Rapid News Network Sunday 25th October, 2015 
said consumers are responding positively to one of the main differentiating features of its service: human curation of playlists. The service – which chiefly takes on Spotify and Rdio – was expected to lose subscribers after the first 3-month free trial period expired. That means a large amount of those trial members canceled their plans before they would be charged $10 per month to keep it. a few users who forgot to cancel their free trial plan, could still cancel after receiving their first bill for the service. Pandora leads in...
